Uses of Class
com.janeirodigital.sai.core.exceptions.SaiException

  • Packages that use SaiException 
    Package Description
    com.janeirodigital.sai.application
    API for client applications as defined by the Solid Application Interoperability specification.
    com.janeirodigital.sai.core  
    com.janeirodigital.sai.core.crud
    Access to corresponding RDF Resources providing create, read, update and delete capabilities
    com.janeirodigital.sai.core.helpers
    Helpers to support general needs like making HTTP requests and working with RDF datasets
    com.janeirodigital.sai.core.http
    Factories to build and access HTTP clients used by sai-java
    com.janeirodigital.sai.core.immutable
    Access to corresponding RDF Resources providing create, read, and delete (but not update) capabilities
    com.janeirodigital.sai.core.readable
    Access to corresponding RDF Resources providing read-only capabilities
